properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.enabled
properties.description: Enable PocketHive control-plane auto-configuration.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.declare-topology
properties.description: Declare queues and bindings derived from the configured topology descriptors.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.exchange
properties.description: Control-plane exchange name used for signal and event traffic.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.swarm-id
properties.description: Swarm identifier shared by all control-plane participants.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.instance-id
properties.description: Control-plane instance identifier shared by worker and manager roles.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.publisher.enabled
properties.description: Expose an AmqpTemplate-backed control-plane publisher bean.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.worker.enabled
properties.description: Enable worker control-plane auto-configuration.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.worker.declare-topology
properties.description: Declare worker queues and bindings based on the worker topology descriptor.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.worker.role
properties.description: Worker role identifier used to resolve the control-plane topology descriptor.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.worker.listener.enabled
properties.description: Expose the WorkerControlPlane listener adapter.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.worker.skip-self-signals
properties.description: Skip signals published by the same worker instance.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.worker.duplicate-cache.enabled
properties.description: Enable duplicate signal detection for workers.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.worker.duplicate-cache.ttl
properties.description: Retention period for the worker duplicate signal cache.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.worker.duplicate-cache.capacity
properties.description: Maximum entries kept in the worker duplicate signal cache.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.manager.enabled
properties.description: Enable manager control-plane auto-configuration.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.manager.declare-topology
properties.description: Declare manager queues and bindings based on the manager topology descriptor.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.manager.role
properties.description: Manager role identifier used to resolve the control-plane topology descriptor.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.manager.listener.enabled
properties.description: Configure consumer-side features for manager services.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.manager.skip-self-signals
properties.description: Skip signals emitted by the same manager instance when consuming messages.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.manager.duplicate-cache.enabled
properties.description: Enable duplicate signal detection for manager listeners.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.manager.duplicate-cache.ttl
properties.description: Retention period for the manager duplicate signal cache.

properties.name: pockethive.control-plane.manager.duplicate-cache.capacity
properties.description: Maximum entries kept in the manager duplicate signal cache.
